venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Social Saucers is very pleased to announce that we will have a guest speaker for this meeting. Robert L. Schroeder will be here discussing his new book, "Solving the UFO Enigma: How Modern Phyysics is Revealing the Technology of UFOs."  Robert will walk us through the book with a slide show presentation, followed a question and answer session. Whether your an UFO enthusiast or have ever wondered if it was real, you don't want to miss this event.

 

Robert Schroeder recently retired after 26 years with a major computer company where he was involved in operations and product management. His educational background includes a BA in mathematics from Rutgers University and an associate's degree in aerospace engineering.

Join in for an evening of intellectual and open minded discussion about UFO's and the like. Discussion will vary every week, from sightings to abductions. A perfect time to share your own experiences and theories or ask questions. If you've ever wondered "Are we Alone?", you don't want to miss this gathering.
All belief systems welcomed. Your group facilitator will be paranormal investigator Mike Stevens, of the Kitt Research Initiative.

Registration is NOT required, drop ins absolutely welcome, open to the public

Weekly attendance not required, but please arrive on time.

Cost - $10 suggested donation. "Help us, Help those who need it"
item.how_to_find_us: Unit 5 in the yellow plaza building. Currently no sign
item.name: Social Saucers Discussion Gathering
